description:
Hinohikari and Nikomaru sneak into St. Pan High School to scope it out. They end up being caught by Yeast King`s homeroom teacher, Crois, but Yeast King puts on their Harvest Show anyway, as if inviting the two of them to check out the competition. After witnessing the overwhelming difference in skill between their two groups, Hinohikari and Nikomaru can`t help but respect their rivals. Then Crois comes up with a plan...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pan wa Pan demo Kuenai Pan
パンはパンでも食えないパン
